lrc.lyric:
Question 15 Have you heard the news that Jame Smeil has resigned his post as prime minister? Well, I got it from the headlines this morning. It's reported that he made public at this decision at the last cabinet meeting. What do we learn about Jame Smeil? Question 16 The morning paper says the space shuttle is taking off at 10 a.m. tomorrow. Yeah, it's just another one of this year's routine missions. The first mission was undertaken a decade ago and broadcast live then worldwide. What can we infer from this conversation? Question 17 We do a lot of camping in the mountains. What would you recommend for two people? You'd probably be better off with the four wheel drive vehicle. We have several off road trucks in stock, both new and used. Where does the conversation most probably take place? Question 18 I hear you did some serious shopping this past weekend. Yeah, the speakers from my old stereo finally gave out and there was no way to repair them. What did the man do over the weekend?


第十五题 你听说了詹姆斯梅尔要辞去总统一职的消息了吗？ 好吧，我在今早的头条上看到了这个消息。据报道，他将在最后一次内阁会议上向公众宣布这个决定。 有关詹姆斯梅尔，我们知道些什么？ 第十六题 今早的报纸说航空飞机将在上午十点起飞。 是的，这是今年的另一个常规任务。第一个任务是发生在十年前，那时候是全世界直播。 我们能从对话中推断出什么？ 第十七题 我们在山上野营了很多次，你可以为两个人提些什么意见吗？ 你们开可以容纳四人的驱动汽车会更舒适。我们现在有一些越野车的存货，包括全新的和用过的。 对话最可能在哪发生？ 第十八题 我听说你上个星期去大采购了。 是的，我的那个旧的立体声扬声器最终还是坏掉了，没法修。 上个星期这位先生做了什么？
